Package pl.put.poznan.buildinginfo.classes

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.put.poznan.buildinginfo.classes.Location
      • pl.put.poznan.buildinginfo.classes.Room
  • public class Room
extends Location
    The Room class represents a room within a building. It extends the Location class and includes attributes for area, heating, lighting, and volume (cube). The class provides methods to calculate average lighting and heating efficiency.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class pl.put.poznan.buildinginfo.classes.Location

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room​(int id,
            String name,
            float area,
            float heating,
            float light,
            float cube)
        Constructs a Room with specific parameters.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier of the room
        name - the name of the room
        area - the area of the room in square meters
        heating - the heating power of the room in kilowatts (kW)
        light - the lighting power of the room in lumens
        cube - the volume (cube) of the room in cubic meters

      • Room

        public Room()
        Constructs a Room with default values.

        This no-argument constructor is required for deserialization.

      • getRoomHeatingCost

        public float getRoomHeatingCost​(float numberOfDays,
                                float price)
        Calculates the heating cost for the given number of days for the room.
        Parameters:
        numberOfDays - the number of days to calculate heating cost for
        price - the price per unit of heating power
        Returns:
        the total heating cost for the specified number of days
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if numberOfDays or price is negative
